classroom

Class FrontWall

  • java.lang.Object
    • classroom.FrontWall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    visual.statik.SimpleContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrontWallWithScreen

    public class FrontWall
extends java.lang.Object
implements visual.statik.SimpleContent
    This class is used to display a simulated classroom.
    Author:
    Ben Kirtley This work complies with the James Madison University honor code
